items.sentence: Tom says he can make a decent living as a sidewalk musician.
Tom says that he and Mary will spend Christmas Day together.
Tom sometimes sees Mary on the street in front of his house.
You should know by now that I can\'t speak French very well.
You should know by now that Tom isn\'t very good at singing.
The game was called off because it suddenly started raining.
Tom wasn\'t really paying attention to what Mary was saying.
I hope you\'re the one who\'s going to be doing the driving.
I don\'t think that I could afford to buy a car like Tom\'s.
I don\'t think that Tom knows anyone who\'s able to do that.
